Ancient shard

Item ID19677

Ancient shards are obtained from monsters found within the Catacombs of Kourend (excluding ghosts). They are used on the altar in the centre of the catacombs for quick transportation to several areas (and are consumed on use):

  • Demon's Run - north-east corner with the lesser & black demons.
  • Dragon's Den - north-west corner with the brutal black dragons.
  • Reeking Cove - southern area with the deviant spectres.
  • The Shallows - south-east corner with the King Sand Crabs.

Three shards can be used with a darklight at the altar in the centre of the Catacombs of Kourend to create an arclight, a degradeable variant of the darklight that provides stats superior to the abyssal tentacle when used against demons. Three shards provide 1,000 charges; up to a maximum of 10,000.

Contents

  • 1 Item sources
  • 2 Products
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 Trivia

Item sources[edit | edit source]

The drop rate of ancient shards (excluding Skotizo) is determined by the amount of hitpoints the monster has.

The exact formula is 3 2 × ( 500 − m i n ( h i t p o i n t s , 400 ) ) {\displaystyle {\frac {3}{2\times (500-\mathrm {min(hitpoints,400)} )}}} .

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).

[[File:Ancient shard detail.png|left|90px]]
'''Ancient shards''' are obtained from monsters found within the [[Catacombs of Kourend]] (excluding [[ghost]]s). They are used on the altar in the centre of the catacombs for quick transportation to several areas (and are consumed on use):
{{List|c=1
|*Demon's Run - north-east corner with the [[Lesser demon|lesser]] & [[black demon]]s.
*Dragon's Den - north-west corner with the [[brutal black dragon]]s.
*Reeking Cove - southern area with the [[deviant spectre]]s.
*The Shallows - south-east corner with the [[King Sand Crab]]s.
}}
Three shards can be used with a [[darklight]] at the [[Altar_(Catacombs_of_Kourend)|altar]] in the centre of the [[Catacombs of Kourend]] to create an [[arclight]], a degradeable variant of the darklight that provides stats superior to the [[abyssal tentacle]] when used against demons. Three shards provide 1,000 charges; up to a maximum of 10,000.

==Item sources==
The drop rate of ancient shards (excluding [[Skotizo]]) is determined by the amount of [[hitpoints]] the monster has.

The exact formula is <math>\frac{3}{2 \times (500-\mathrm{min(hitpoints, 400)})}</math>.
